turns.answer:
You need to know about your finances.

You need to be educated about money laundering. Don't go to your bank with no insurance for it.

Ask your accountant about your income and to make a donation to charity.
turns.label: lie

turns.answer: I was at the hospital and a friend of mine in town went to work, but we were so close for about half an hour, he went to the police station and he came to my house. I woke up and he said 'Oh
